Name: Kazakh Drive
About the game: In this game you will find: - Realistic highway driving simulation. - Various time and weather conditions. - Ability to listen to your favorite music through the in-game player. - The element of competition. The leaderboard will allow you to evaluate your success among other rival players. - Beautiful pixel graphics.
